title: Angelical Wisdoms: Messages to nourish the soul
description: You are amazeballs, the bomb, so perfectly created, the superhero in your own life...Yet we don't always feels this day to day, when life gets in the way and your inner light feels further and further away.That is where Angelical Wisdoms steps in - to get you thinking, to help ignite your inner flame to epic proportions, to connect you back to the Divine and your spiritual pit crew, to give you that kick you may have been needing or a gentle angel wing hug to know you are not alone.Open to a page and let your heart and soul devour the words, the energy and allow your natural power to grow and shine.Let the world need sunglasses for your epic light.Each page contains a short thought provoking, positive and uplifting message.
author: Julia Van Der Sluys
